original_text: The people were very surprised about everything that Jesus did. They said, ‘Jesus has done everything well. If people cannot hear, Jesus makes them able to hear. If people cannot speak, Jesus makes them able to speak.’
korean_text: 사람들이 심히 놀라 이르되 그가 모든 것을 잘하였도다 못 듣는 사람도 듣게 하고 말 못하는 사람도 말하게 한다 하니라

sentences.original_text: They said, 'Jesus has done everything well'
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 말하길, '예수님은 모든 것을 잘 하셨다'

sentences.original_text: Jesus makes them able to hear
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 들을 수 있게 하신다

sentences.original_text: Jesus makes them able to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 그들이 말할 수 있게 하신다
